name: Punxsutawney Water Service Company, Appellant, v. Saricks et al.
name_abbreviation: Punxsutawney Water Service Co. v. Saricks

judges: Before Maxet, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Punxsutawney Water Service Company, Appellant, v. Saricks et al.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed. Costs to abide the event.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Punxsutawney Water Service Company, Appellant, v. Saricks et al.
Argued March 25, 1946.
Before Maxet, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Joseph A. Beck, with him Robert M. Morris, Morris é Morris and Pents & Silberblatt, for appellant.
Robert V. Maine, with him Smith & Maine, Clarence R. Kramer, Chase & Swoope and Boulton & Boulton, for appellees.
May 1, 1946:
